name: ANS | [TECH] - Expired user IDs must not be recycled.
description: De-activated or expired user IDs should not be assigned to other individuals.
testingInformation:
1. The process for generating IDs must ensure that issued credentials are unique
2. When IDs are expired they must not be recycled or re-attributed.
actionPlanInstructions:
1. Use appropriate random generators to generate uuid.
2. Standardize the use of temporary sessions when possible
3. Identify and remove the processes recycling IDs
actionPlanTitle: IDs are not unique or being recycled.
